settings.title: Natural Skincare, Powered by Plants
settings.subtitle:
Kanapa™ is our exclusive skincare range, scientifically formulated with powerful botanical actives and oils that are proven by science.

Each ingredient has been carefully selected for its unique natural properties to provide the right nutrients to skin cells, helping you achieve a healthy natural glow.

settings.custom_liquid:
Cruelty Free

Dermatologically Tested

Free From Harmful Chemicals

settings.title: Healthy Skin, Timeless Beauty
settings.answer:
Discover the secret to a radiant complexion with our Kanapa™ skincare range. Each product is carefully formulated to promote optimal skin health and deliver a natural, glowing complexion. Packed with powerful antioxidants and a rich blend of omega 3, 6, and 9, our formulas are designed to nourish your skin, providing essential nutrients to every cell.

Experience the perfect balance of pH, deep nourishment, and maximum hydration with Kanapa™.

settings.title: Clean formulation
settings.answer:
At Kanapa™, we believe in the power of nature to enhance your skin’s natural beauty. We design our clean formulations carefully to ensure that everything you apply to your skin is pure, gentle, and effective. 

  • No Harsh Chemicals: We steer clear of harmful ingredients, ensuring your skin receives only the best natural care.
  • Dermatologically Tested: Each product is carefully tested to be gentle on your skin, providing safe and effective results.
  • Cruelty-Free: Our commitment to ethical beauty means no animal testing—ever.

settings.title: THE KANAPA EFFECT
settings.answer:
Our advanced skincare range features a unique and powerful blend of eight potent ingredients, delivering a burst of antioxidants and nutrients that are clinically proven to reduce the signs of aging. 

In our independent clinical trial, products with our exclusive Kanapa™ blend have shown remarkable results. They offer genuine nourishment for your skin, smoothing out wrinkles, improving skin texture, reducing rosacea and redness, deeply hydrating, and minimizing imperfections. 

Treat yourself to the Kanapa skincare range for real results you can see.

settings.title: Proudly New Zealand Made
settings.answer: Kanapa™ is a New Zealand te reo Māori word that translates to “bright” or “glowing”, reflecting our commitment to radiant skin. We are proud of our New Zealand origin and history. Kanapa™ skincare harnesses the purity and potency of locally sourced botanical actives, such as mamaku extract, harakeke oil, and manuka honey. Every product is infused with the best nature has to offer from our beautiful land.

settings.html_content: Free USA/CAN express courier shipping over $125

settings.title: THE ULTIMATE SKIN NUTRITION
settings.text:
Imagine waking up every day to a naturally clear, even complexion that glows from within. We believe clear, radiant skin is a result of what you put on your skin, but also what you put in your body.

At Xtendlife™, we have been producing and manufacturing advanced, scientifically formulated nutritional supplements for over two decades. Drawing on the knowledge and expertise of how to utilize essential fatty acids and nutrients to nourish your body from the inside, we launched our first skincare range in 2008. Both our premium nutritional supplements and advanced Kanapa™ skincare range are rich in omega-3, 6 and 9 fatty acids as well as potent antioxidants that repair, protect and nourish your skin internally and externally.

We took our quest for the ultimate skin nourishment a step further and developed specific nutritional supplements that supported radiant skin from within. Xtendlife™ Skin-Support, Omega 3 / DHA Plus and Zupafood™ for Skin are packed with powerful antioxidants such as omega fatty acids, marine collagen, New Zealand grape seed extract, lycopene and glutathione, to provide the ultimate nourishment to support skin, hair and nails.

Combined with our advanced Kanapa™ skincare range, we have the health and appearance
